p: Introduction: 809 Liver Trasplantations (LT) were made at Hospital Clínico Universitario de Santiago de Compostela (Spain) in the period 1994-2014, accounting 4.25 % of all LT performed in Spain (19005 cases, according to the Spanish Liver Transplant Registry- RETH). 20 years of experience review and comparison of Acumulated Surveillance Rates of our experience respect to the Spanish data provided by RETH.
